comments.body:
Without -op option it works fine:
```
maxpro:temporal maxim$ ./tctl -do default workflow list
             WORKFLOW TYPE            |  WORKFLOW ID  |                RUN ID                | START TIME | EXECUTION TIME | END TIME
```

title: CLI SIGSEGV
